description: Request for an Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA) Scoping Opinion, under the The Town and Country Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) Regulations 2017, for the demolition of the existing building and construction of a ground floor plus 13 storey building (reaching approximately 74.5 m AOD) mixed-use scheme, comprising predominantly office (Use Class B1) space on the upper floor levels, with flexible provision sought in terms of retail, restaurant and drinking establishment (Use Classes A1, A3, A4), 'competitive socialising' (Sui Generis) and (Use Class D2) floorspace on the lower levels.  The proposed development would also include a restaurant (Use Class A3) to cover the same footprint of the existing building and would be deepened.
